infos.value: Gates left wide open. No reinforcements being marched out...
I wonder what King Oelde intends with all this.
Maybe he's really eager for Lord Mont to go inside?
But Lord Mont is...
If you want to run, then run.
I will not hold your decisions against you.
Wait! Are you telling us to flee?
It is your best option. I cannot think of any other way...
Hmm. Then allow me to do as I please.
Allow me the same courtesy.
I am sorry. Thanks for everything.
If only you had been placed under Sterne's command instead...none of this would have happened.
...What is it? Why are you still here?
Tch. I wish you wouldn't underestimate us like that.
Huh...?
We're «Caelum», Lord Mont's sword and shield, are we not?
We will be by your side, no matter where the road may take us.
Let's show them what it means to be the pride of Leonis!
I, too, serve only Lord Mont!
A-all of you...
No need to get emotional, now. We've got soldiers to deal with!
